body_html:
This seems similar to #11721. If possible, can you post a simpler example? It is difficult to debug this issues on large projects, and it is unknown if the memory leak is in TensorFlow itself or in the GA3C code.

Marking as contributions welcome if anyone wants to take a stab at finding where the memory leak is in the GA3C or TensorFlow code.

body:
This seems similar to #11721. If possible, can you post a simpler example? It is difficult to debug this issues on large projects, and it is unknown if the memory leak is in TensorFlow itself or in the GA3C code.

Marking as contributions welcome if anyone wants to take a stab at finding where the memory leak is in the GA3C or TensorFlow code.
